comments: Horrible teacher. DON\'T take him cause if you do you will be teaching yourself math!

He\'s a nice guy but has NO idea what he\'s talking about!! He leaves it up to you to figure out the lesson and its pretty much a self taught class because he doesn\'t teach you at all. If your not very good at math DONT TAKE THIS CLASS or you won\'t do well!
I know he is trying his best. He is a student teacher & it shows. The only way I made an A is because my boyfriend is an engineering major and is super smart!

he is very helpful but at the same time he treats you like your in grade school i would recommend taking him if your not very good at math but if you are good don\'t take him but overall he is a pretty good teacher
